snippet: Police said Friday that they had still not been able to question Eva Rausing’s husband, Hans Kristian Rausing, who is a suspect in her death and currently under medical care.
abstract: London police say they still have not been able to question Eva Rausing's husband, Hans Kristian Rausing, heir to his family's multibillion dollar cardboard-packaging fortune, who is a suspect in her death and currently under medical care.
lead_paragraph: Police said Friday that they had still not been able to question Eva Rausing’s husband, Hans Kristian Rausing, who is a suspect in her death and currently under medical care.

headline.seo: Britain: Hans Kristian Rausing Unfit to Talk, Police Say
headline.main: Britain: Wealthy Suspect Unfit to Talk
headline.print_headline: Britain: Wealthy Suspect Unfit to Talk
